item.title: Avengers: Endgame
item.description: The plot of the movie "Avengers: Endgame" tells about the events after Thanos was able to carry out his plan. Half Vmelennoj evaporate and now nobody knows what will happen next. Naturally the situation is not the best way, and many have lost their loved ones. Stark is committed in another world and no one knows if he is alive. The same is happening on the ground is a real mess. Many people do not believe that someday will be able to fix something, but do it. The Avengers lost their war and it seems that there is no way out of the situation. But give up they are just not going. Will have to challenge the mad Titan and try to win this time. To do so would be extremely difficult and complicated, but it is to rely on the positive result. Only by bringing all his forces together, they will be able to strike, which would probably fix this whole situation. Ahead of their final battle, in which each character would try to participate. What this all will end and whether they will oppose such a strong enemy? Once failed, so it is not known why this all will lead! War is only just beginning and is nearing the most finals, which will put an end to this confrontation.

item.title: Wolves
item.description: One day, waking up at night, the protagonist finds his murdered parents. Having decided that it was his handiwork, the guy turns into a wild Wolf and leaves home. The true reason for leaving the hero from home-an unfair accusation Caleb murder their own parents. He did not commit, however, forced to hide in a safe place in town called Wolf Ridge. As it turns out, this place is filled with mysticism and is inextricably linked to the secret family guy by Caleb will have to unravel. The life of a young man no longer will be the same, because the entire responsibility he learns his true purpose in life.

The girl turns out to be the wife of the great Wizard Merlin. Of course, fight alone with this enemy cannot and battle with evil our Sapphire will assist a team of people, each of whom is a professional.

item.title: Shazam!
item.description: The old sorcerer is no longer able to fight the forces of evil. It is time to find a successor. The magician's choice fell on 14-year-old Billy Bjetsona. All that is required from the teen-speak the name of the ancient Mage-Shazam and the guy immediately turns into a superhero, with adult. From new abilities the guy Boggle. Together with her best friend and then they test new skills, which are not so easy to cope. But after meeting with mighty villain Dr. Taddeusom Sivanoj Billy realizes that was endowed with superpowers is not accidental. He has to save the world from evil.

This baby elephant is incredibly large ears, which immediately became the subject of constant jokes by colleagues Holt.

News on "smolfute" brought him fame and a chance to win the girl of his dreams. And yet-cause a stir among ordinary Yeti who now wonder what else lives in the big world outside their small snowbound villages.

item.title: Sherlock Gnomes
item.description: Gnomeo and Juliette are waited by a new fascinating adventure — now in huge London. When heroes with families and friends move to the city, their main care — to prepare the new garden by spring. But soon they learn disturbing news: across all London their fellows gnomes enigmatically disappear! And once Gnomeo and Juliette, having come back home, find, as all their relatives disappeared. In such situation can only come to the rescue … Sherlock Gnoms. The famous detective becomes on protection of inhabitants of the London gardens and not without the aid of the faithful companion Watson undertakes to solve tangled case.
